transcripts.text: Again, we had the strongest economy in the world.  Carl.  Did you have one in the back there, please?

Thank you.  Mr.  President, COVID cases continue to rise around the country.  You said in your last stand-up special that you had asked your people to slow down testing in order to make the numbers look better, which, by the way, is f***ing brilliant.  You're also not requiring people to wear masks at your rallies, which... Well, that doesn't matter.  Nobody goes to those anyway.  But don't you think you should be following CDC guidelines and leading by example?
They're not mandatory guidelines.  They're guidelines.  They suggest you could wear them.  You don't have to wear them.

Well, I took the liberty of stopping by the drugstore on my way over and picked up a few samples for you to try out.  Let's see.  You got your standard three-layer disposable.  Can't go wrong with that.  Oh, this one's kind of fun and flirty, right?  No?  Let's see.  They were all out of N95s, but the guy behind the counter said this was a very popular model.  Hmm?
I mean, most people can just make something out of a certain material.  I won't be doing it personally.

You're looking awful grouchy.  Cover your freaking face.  Listen to Dr.  Fauci.  Cover your freaking face.  Don't wait around for herd immunity, you reckless thug.  And what a golden opportunity to hide that mug.
Although you should require us to do what's right to do.  You're siding with a virus, cause you're a virus too.  So back up girl, don't get in my space.  And cover your freaking face.
I don't see it for myself, I just, uh...

And if you're feeling fancy... Or on your way to prom.  Why not be more like Nancy?  Make it a whole ensemble, yes.  Tie up your face with a bandana, please.  It's not taboo.  Think of your poor old ailing nana.  She's counting on you not to kill her.  Please don't politicize it.  Don't be a pot like Pence.  Don't sit and scrutinize it.  It's only common sense.  Don't spread droplets all over the place.  Cover your freaking face.
You can do it.  You don't have to do it.

I'm choosing not to do it.  Dance break.  And in the same way testing less would make COVID just quit.  Maybe if we can't see your mouth, you won't say stupid shit.  Huh?  Don't thumb your nose at science.  You'll find it doesn't work.  Ooh, knock off that noncompliance.  Don't be a selfish jerk.  Just stop drooling and slow down the pace.  Just cover your freaking face.
Wearing a face mask, I don't see it for myself.
I'm choosing not to do it.
Girl, just put a paper bag over that thing.
